generate-link: generate the URL of your cover here
copyright: All rights reserved (and the lefts too)
text-support: If you have any questions about Lymbrarie or would like to report a bug, please contact this email.
access: Log In to access your profile
delete-message: Do you want to delete this book?
page-not-found: The specified route does not exist
unsaved-changes: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to go out?
performing-maintenance-tasks: I am performing maintenance tasks to improve your experience.
please-come-back-later: Please come back later. I promise not to take long!
unknown: An unexpected error occurred, please reload the website and verify your connection. If the error persists, report it to this email:
hardware-msg: If you want to enjoy the animations, please enable hardware acceleration of the browser.
donations-text: This project is the effort of a single person. If you enjoy using Lymbrarie and would like to see more improvements, please consider making a donation. Your contribution makes a difference!
sign-in-to-add: Sign in to add a book!
text-offline: You need an internet connection to add, edit, or delete a book.
book-find: where every book finds its place
privacy-1: At Lymbrarie, I value and respect your privacy. Therefore, I only use your name, email, and user photo. This data is used exclusively to identify you and synchronize your book collection, ensuring that you can keep your records safe.
privacy-2: I do not share, sell, or disclose your personal information to third parties without your express consent, unless required by law.
privacy-3: Your information is protected with appropriate security measures, including encryption, both locally and in the database. At Lymbrarie, I am committed to ensuring the security and confidentiality of your data.
privacy-4: If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me.
